sources.title: Le Sorcier Arabe
sources.description: A sorcerer draws signs on the sand making charming young women. Director: Segundo de Chomón Writer: Segundo de Chomón Country: France Language: French Release Date: 1906 Also Known As: El brujo arabe (Spain) The Arabic Sorcere (English) Production Co: Pathé Frères Pathé Frères Film Catalogue no. 1446
